name: Buy Tickets to: BLESSTHEFALL (11/22/2008 @ The Venue of Scottsdale)
description:
ONLINE PRESALE FOR THIS SHOW HAS ENDED.
Tickets are still available at the door.

Saturday, November 22, 2008
BLESSTHEFALL

with:
DROP DEAD, GORGEOUS
THE STILETTO FORMAL
CONFIDE
BEYOND ALL GLORY

Saturday November 22, 2008
Doors at 6pm
The Venue of Scottsdale
7117 E. 3rd Avenue
Scottsdale, AZ
(click for map)

*PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING TICKETS*
Tickets are WILL CALL only. TICKETS WILL NOT BE MAILED OUT. Once you purchase tickets online, you will receive a receipt via email from Paypal. Please print the receipt and present it at the venue for entry.

TICKET FEE:
There is a fee of $1.50 per ticket to cover the costs of the transaction, and advanced ticketing. Paypal will indicate this charge as shipping on your Paypal receipt, but please make no mistake, as stated above, tickets are will call only.
